plugin.name: Easyforms Plugin
plugin.description:
The EasyForms plugin allows you to build simple HTML forms within Hippo CMS.
Standard features include validation, form data persistence and export, form submission by e-mail, confirmation by e-mail, and many common form field types and validation rules.
In addition, EasyForms is very extensible. It supports custom field types and validation rules, and pluggable behaviors.
